In a world where clouds are more than just vapor, a mystical school floated high above the earth, known as Nimbus Academy. Students from all over the globe attended classes in classrooms made of shimmering mist, where lessons on weather patterns and sky navigation were taught by wise, ancient storm spirits. Each student carried a unique cloud-shaped charm that granted them the ability to control small weather phenomena. On graduation day, they would summon their first storm, marking their passage into adulthood. However, when a mischievous student accidentally unleashed a thunderstorm, they learned the importance of responsibility and harmony with nature.
